subject: can I run parallel tests in JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi I am new to using JUnit.  Can anyone tell me if TestSuit executes your tests in parallel, is there anything in JUnit I can use to simulate parallel calls to
messageBody:
Hi I am new to using JUnit. Can anyone tell me if TestSuit executes
your tests in parallel, is there anything in JUnit I can use to
simulate parallel calls to my methods, or is the only way to do this
is to my own threads?
